# dataCell

**Instance Property**

The cell prototype used by the table column to draw individual cells.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var dataCell: Any { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can use this property to control the font, alignment, and other text attributes for the table column contents.

You can also assign a cell that displays things other than text—for example, you can display images by setting the cell to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImageCell].



## Deprecated Methods

- **dataCell(forRow:)**: Returns the cell object used to display values in the specified row of the table column.
